alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:15AM CST until February 14 at 7:42AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Pickens Counties. Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale, Marengo and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect at Bevill Lock and Dam, and Demopolis Lock and Dam. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 123.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CST Monday was 124.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 112.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 122.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
